LittleGreenhouseDescription: A place to grow crops from any season all year round!
BigGreenhouseDescription: More space to grow your crops all year round!
DeluxeGreenhouseDescription: An improved greenhouse with greater capacity for your crops all year round!
TreeGreenhouseDescription: A place to plant trees from any season all year round!
BigTreeGreenhouseDescription: More space to plant trees from any season all year round!
DeluxeTreeGreenhouseDescription: A spacious greenhouse to grow more trees regardless of the season!
LittleCellarDescription: Houses casks that can age products to increase their quality and value.
BigCellarDescription: A spacious area to place more casks and improve products on a large scale.
DeluxeCellarDescription: An upgraded cellar with extra space for superior aging.
